1: I look up at the vast size of the mountains— from where will my help come in times of trouble?
2: The Eternal Creator of heaven and earth and these mountains will send the help I need.
3: He holds you firmly in place; He will not let you fall. He who keeps you will never take His eyes off you and never drift off to sleep.
4: What a relief! The One who watches over Israel never leaves for rest or sleep.
5: The Eternal keeps you safe, so close to Him that His shadow is a cooling shade to you.
6: Neither bright light of sun nor dim light of moon will harm you.
7: The Eternal will keep you safe from all of life's evils,
8: From your first breath to the last breath you breathe, from this day and forever.
